ad.title: Room to rent in 6-bedroom apartment in Camden
ad.content:
**The easy choice**
_Because I want to pack my bags and move straight in._
**Will I like it here?**
We think so
Are you looking for a spacious room in an enviable location? Lots of rooms means lots of new friends. Get social!
**Really? Tell me more...**
You will love the setup here. It’s a stylish apartment with all the basics and a generous kitchen and dining area. Round up the troops and get cooking. There’s no better way to make friends than with food.
We think this apartment is ideal for sociable individuals looking for a location to match their fun-loving lifestyle. Camden is a happening spot, close to late night music venues, authentic eateries, and lush green public parks.
**Your top 3 reasons to rent here:**
- The bedrooms are nicely furnished and spacious. - The modern kitchen. What's your speciality? - The Regent's Park is just a short stroll away.
**But you need to know this…**
- The apartment is located on the 2nd floor and there is no elevator – get in a free leg workout every day.
**Your Home-checker, Kamil, said:**
_"This apartment has spacious rooms and is in a great location. The underground is only a 6-minute walk away.”_
**Help me make up my mind…**
This is a spacious 2nd floor, 6-bedroom apartment on Clarence Gardens, London. It boasts spacious bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cosy dining area.
This property is ideal for sociable individuals. You’ll be in a lively neighborhood, with great nightlife, authentic restaurants, and iconic spots like The Regent's Park close by.

ad.title: Stylish 1-bedroom apartment to rent in Kentish Town
ad.content:
**The one with the charm**
_Because I like my home to match my personality._
**Will I like it here?**
We think so.
Is a contemporary aesthetic at the top of your checklist? Look no further, your new life in the city awaits, in this impeccably stylish 1-bedroom apartment.
**Really? Tell me more…**
You will love the captivating colours that make the place pop. The tastefully furnished apartment has been carefully thought out, to ensure you relax in the most luxurious space. The open-plan living area and kitchen is perfect for carrying on the party after nights out in Camden! This one without doubt, will get your friends talking.
We think this apartment is ideal for a laid back, but indulgent couple looking for a vibrant and accessible spot. Kentish Town is a colourful and flamboyant area, and close to numerous top notch taverns, restaurants and classy bars.
**Your top 3 reasons to rent here:**
- The apartment has a modern and stylish finish throughout. - You've got underfloor heating! - You're well connected and within easy reach of central London.
**But you need to know this...**
- There is a washing machine but no dryer – no problem, air dry your underwear on the balcony.
**Your Home-checker, Kamil, said:**
_“I loved this property. It’s very stylish and bright with large windows that let in lots of natural light. The location is great, and you’ve got everything you need within easy reach.”_
**Help me make up my mind…**
This is a stylish 3rd floor, 1-bedroom apartment on Caversham Road, Kentish Town. It boasts beautiful furnishings, an ideal layout for entertaining whilst you whip up some cocktails, and it gets plenty of natural light.
This property is ideal for an extravagant but hard working couple. You’ll be in a fun and creative neighborhood, with shops, local restaurants and spots like the Camden Town Brewery within striking distance.

ad.title: Classy 2-bedroom apartment to rent in Kentish Town
ad.content:
**The one with the charisma**
_Because I like to be an individual._
**Will I like it here?**
It would be hard not to.
Is classy glamour and captivating beauty one of your must haves? Your wait is over, let your new life start, in this flawlessly sublime 2-bedroom apartment.
**Really? Tell me more…**
You will love the bright, warming nature of the apartment, which matches perfectly with the unparalleled design and finish. With two generous bedrooms and two balconies, this is an apartment that keeps on giving. Throw open those doors and take the party outside, let the music flow all around, or lounge about in your lavish living room watching films in pyjamas.
We think this apartment is ideal for fun loving friends or those always looking for a good time. Kentish Town is a busy little place, full of all those quintessentially London things, merely a short stroll away.
**Your top 3 reasons to rent here:**
- The apartment has a modern and stylish finish throughout. - Did we mention the underfloor heating, socks, not needed! - The location, you can head towards or away from London in no time.
**But you need to know this...**
- There is a washing machine but no dryer – no problem, air dry your underwear on the balcony.
**Your Home-checker, Kamil, said:**
_“I loved this property. It’s very beautiful and bright with large windows and one bedroom has a nice ensuite. The location is amazing, Kentish Town Station is 5 minutes walk away.”_
**Help me make up my mind…**
This is a stylish 3rd floor, 2-bedroom apartment on Caversham Road, Kentish Town. It boasts plenty of space and is brimming with character, two balconies to take in summer sun, and transport links towards and away from London.
This property is ideal for bubbly families or party loving friends. You’ll be in a fresh and on the rise neighborhood, with plenty of pubs, taverns, places to shop and Camden Market within striking distance.

ad.title: Contemporary 2-bedroom flat to rent in Holland Park
ad.content:
**The super slick set-up**
_Because I love a contemporary space_
**Will I like it here?**
It would be hard not to.
Looking for a modern flat in a charming neighbourhood close to Holland Park? This one ticks all the boxes.
**Really? Tell me more...**
You will love the contemporary style here. The open-plan living room and kitchen is bright and spacious. The room gets a ton of sun through the double glazed windows, and has a breakfast bar and a huge sofa.
We think it’s ideal for a sophisticated group looking for upscale living with lots of outdoor space. Within 15 minutes on foot, you'll find Holland Park, Ladbroke Square Garden, and Hyde Park.
**Your top 3 reasons to live here:**
- The open-plan living room is bright and modern. - There is 1 ensuite bathroom and 1 shared bathroom. - You're in a trendy spot with lots to do within walking distance.
**But you need to know this...**
- There isn't any A/C installed here — you are in London though, so you should be fine!
**Your Home-checker, Kamil, said:**
_“I loved this property. It’s a very modern flat just 2 minutes' walk from Holland Park underground station. The living room is very spacious, with a nice corner sofa."_
**Help me make up my mind...**
This is a contemporary 5th floor, 2-bedroom flat on Ladbroke Road, London. It boasts an open-plan living room and kitchen, plus a total of 2 bathrooms, one of which is an ensuite.
This property is ideal for a trendy group looking for a home to match. You're less than 5 minutes' walk from Holland Park, and less than 15 minutes from the enormous Westfield London shopping centre.

ad.title: Bright room to rent in 5-bedroom apartment in Southfields
ad.content:
This is a very comfortable 5-bedroom apartment with spacious rooms to rent. The kitchen is modern and fully equipped. Its black tiled backsplash back gives it a modern and stylish feel. As for the bathroom, it has a calm atmosphere with a tall shower and a nice sink.
Southfields is a quiet, leafy part of London. You'll get a break from the hustle and bustle of the city. You can wander around King George's park and work out at its Nuffield Health gym. The nearest supermarket is a Tesco express, which is a 7-minute walk away.
ad.address: St John's Dr, London SW18 4UN, UK

ad.title: Cosy room for rent in 5-bedroom apartment in Acton
ad.content:
There are rooms available to rent in this furnished 5-bedroom apartment on Churchfield Road, Acton. This property offers a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. The shared bathroom is equipped with a bathtub and shower. Finally, there is also gas heating installed throughout.
Located in the Acton area, this property is just a short walk from a wide range of local shops and restaurants. And, with easy access to local public transport, it takes just over half an hour to get right into the heart of the city. There is also a range of parks within easy walking distance.

ad.title: Bright room for rent in 5-bedroom flatshare in Acton
ad.content:
There are rooms available to rent in this furnished 5-bedroom apartment on Churchfield Road, Acton. This property offers a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. The shared bathroom is equipped with a bathtub and shower. Finally, there is also gas heating installed throughout.
Located in the Acton area, this property is just a short walk from a wide range of local shops and restaurants. And, with easy access to local public transport, it takes just over half an hour to get right into the heart of the city. There is also a range of parks within easy walking distance.

ad.title: Room in 5-bedroom flatshare in Putney, London
ad.content:
There are rooms available to rent in this furnished 5-bedroom apartment on Cromford Road, Putney. This property offers a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, with 1 shared bathroom and separate toilet. There is also eating installed throughout this apartment.
Located in the Putney area, this property is just over 10-minutes' walk from Southside Wandsworth Shopping Mall. This offers a range of shops, as well as a gym and supermarket. And, the city centre is just 30-minutes' away, an easily commutable distance.

ad.title: Nice room with street-view window in Acton
ad.content:
The rooms for rent in this stylish 3-bedroom flat, close to Regent's University, are located on Churchfield Road in Acton. It’s a 2nd floor apartment with a couple of shared spaces. The equipped kitchen is modern, stylish, and includes a washing machine. And there is a large bathroom with a tub.
Acton is west of the city center. Your new home is close to Acton College and near Springfield Gardens. There are a few pubs and restaurants around this residential area, and the supermarket is a 5-minute walk away. There are also nearby gyms, as well as a swimming pool.

ad.title: Small room with street-view window in Acton
ad.content:
The rooms for rent in this stylish 3-bedroom flat, close to Regent's University, are located on Churchfield Road in Acton. It’s a 2nd floor apartment with a couple of shared spaces. The equipped kitchen is modern, stylish, and includes a washing machine. And there is a large bathroom with a tub.
Acton is west of the city center. Your new home is close to Acton College and near Springfield Gardens. There are a few pubs and restaurants around this residential area, and the supermarket is a 5-minute walk away. There are also nearby gyms, as well as a swimming pool.

ad.title: Bright room with decorative fireplace in Acton
ad.content:
The rooms for rent in this terrific 4-bedroom flat on Churchfield Road in Acton, London are located on the 1st floor. There are only two shared spaces in this flat. The first is a full bathroom with a tub. The second is a spacious and modern kitchen, which is fully equipped and includes a dining table and washing machine.
Acton is a residential neighbourhood, west of downtown London. There are plenty of activities, from karting to swimming. You’re close to Acton College and near a few green spaces, like Putt In The Park. Banks and grocery stores are nearby, and so are a few pubs and restaurants.

ad.title: Calm room with street view window in Acton
ad.content:
The rooms for rent in this terrific 4-bedroom flat on Churchfield Road in Acton, London are located on the 1st floor. There are only two shared spaces in this flat. The first is a full bathroom with a tub. The second is a spacious and modern kitchen, which is fully equipped and includes a dining table and washing machine.
Acton is a residential neighbourhood, west of downtown London. There are plenty of activities, from karting to swimming. You’re close to Acton College and near a few green spaces, like Putt In The Park. Banks and grocery stores are nearby, and so are a few pubs and restaurants.

ad.title: Charming 1-bedroom flat for rent in Whitechapel
ad.content:
This 65 m², 2-bedroom flat is available for rent in Whitechapel, London. There is an open plan living room and kitchen, with the living room area having a sofa and chair where you can relax in front of the television after work. The kitchen is fully-equipped with everything you need to cook a meal, including cutlery, crockery, an oven, a microwave, and an electric stove, and once its made you can eat it at the dining table and chairs. There is also a dishwasher, saving you on washing up. There is a single bedroom which has both a double and single bed, as well as a chest of drawers and built-in wardrobe, while the bathroom has a toilet, sink, and bathtub/ shower.
The flat itself is located on a residential street, making this a good place for peace and quiet! However, the A13 is at the end of the road and there you'll find lots of shops, fast food restaurants, and a few pubs. There is also a Tesco Metro just a 7-minute walk away, and the Barts School of Medicine and Dentistry is nearby too.
ad.address: Back Church Ln, Whitechapel, London E1 1LX, UK

ad.title: Nice room with window in Acton
ad.content:
The rooms for rent in this wonderful 4-bedroom flat in the 3rd floor are located on Churchfield Road, close to Regent's University, in Acton. It has a spacious shared kitchen, which is fully equipped and includes a gas stove and a washing machine. And it has a quiet little balcony. There is also a shared bath and an additional shower room.
Acton is a well-connected residential neighbourhood. Your new flat is close to Southfields Playing Fields, a couple of gyms, and a swimming pool. With a 5-minute walk, you’ll find a grocery store and a few pubs and restaurants. And Acton College, which is part of West London College, is just down the street.
